hero.name: Rizaldi Abyannata.
hero.subtitle: I build robust backends & dynamic frontends.
hero.description: A proactive 7th-semester Informatics Engineering student with practical experience as a Full-Stack Developer. I specialize in building robust backend systems with Node.js and bringing ideas to life on the web.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: Hello! I'm Rizaldi, a passionate Full-Stack Developer with a strong focus on backend technologies. My journey into programming began in my first year of college, where I discovered a love for building things that live on the internet. Since then, I've been honing my skills in Node.js, Express.js, and modern frontend frameworks like React and Vue.
about.p2: My goal is to build efficient, scalable, and maintainable web applications. I enjoy the challenge of solving complex problems and I'm always eager to learn new technologies and best practices.
about.p3: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new open-source projects, or contributing to the developer community.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.p1: I'm currently looking for new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
